subSections.title: Translingual
subSections.text:
{{stroke order|type=bw|strokes=7}}
{{ja-forms|系 [[係]] [[繋]]|系 系 系|系 [[係]] [[繫]]}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: In Chinese, this character both exists as a traditional character and as simplification of [[係]] and [[繫]]. In Japanese, 系 and 係 are separate characters, while 繫 is inofficially simplified as [[繋]] ([[extended shinjitai]]).
